summary: Tested 9 new backend API endpoints for iteration 89: Streak tracking, past seasonal badges gallery, admin challenge management, leaderboard management, and enhanced analytics (seller, engagement, platform). All 18 tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: All tested endpoints return proper response structures with pagination where appropriate
Streak badges correctly defined: Hot Streak (3), On Fire (5), Unstoppable (10)
Past seasonal badges endpoint uses category='challenge' and is_limited=True to identify seasonal badges - currently empty gallery as no seasonal badges have been created yet
MOCKED: SendGrid email for challenge reminders - requires SENDGRID_API_KEY configuration
seed_data_creation: Created admin user testadmin89@test.com for testing. Created one test challenge via POST /api/admin/challenges
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 9 new endpoints verified working. Admin credentials: testadmin89@test.com / TestAdmin123!. Streak tracking collects completions and awards badges at thresholds 3, 5, 10. Past seasonal badges gallery is empty but API structure is correct.

main_backend_endpoints.description: Returns user's challenge completion streak with current, longest, total_completions, bonus_points, and next_badge info
Returns gallery of past seasonal badges with pagination and year filtering. Currently empty as no seasonal badges created yet

admin_backend_endpoints.description: Lists custom challenges with pagination and participation stats
Creates custom seasonal challenges with badge rewards
Returns overview stats: total_custom, active, currently_running, participants, completions, completion_rate
Returns badge leaderboard with user details and pagination
Returns seller analytics: top_sellers, active_sellers, new_sellers, growth, metrics
Returns engagement analytics: messages, favorites, active_users, badges, notifications
Returns platform analytics: users, listings, revenue, category breakdown
